attributes.action: The Foreign Secretary has, by incompetence, damaged UK's standing & must resign
attributes.background: The Foreign Secretary, Boris Johnson, on repeated occasions, made careless and sometimes deliberate mistakes.  These have detrimentally affected relations with other countries, undermined our Foreign Policy, and adversely affected the treatment of a British Citizen in a foreign gaol.

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP/Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
